soprano.calculate.xrd.xrd.xrd_pwd_peaks(latt_abc, lambdax=1.54056, theta2_tol=1e-06)¶

Calculate the peaks (without intensities) of a powder XRD spectrum given the lattice in ABC form and the X-ray wavelength

Args:
latt_abc (np.ndarray): periodic lattice in ABC form, Angstroms and radians
lambdax (Optional[float]): X-ray wavelength in Angstroms (default is 1.54056 Ang)
theta2_tol (Optional[float]): Tolerance within which two theta angles (in degrees)
are considered to be one and the same (default is 1e-6 deg)
Returns:
xpeaks (XraySpectrum): a named tuple containing the peaks with theta2,
corresponding hkl indices, intensities and wavelength
Raises:
ValueError: if some of the arguments are invalid
